name: Five Days at Levino
description:
A civil war is looming in the country of Levino, but no news are coming out. The country has gone dark.

As a journalist, it is up to you to report on what you can find and tell the outside world about it. However, three factions are vying for control of the country and your actions can be their consequences. Be careful of what you report about them.

Good luck.

Controls:
WASD - Movement

ESC - Pause menu
